_comment: PREP LIST CONFIGURATION - Edit these values to change prep list calculations
_instructions: After editing, tell Claude to update the prep list code with your new settings

sauceSets._note: How many portions per sauce set (Tzatziki, Aioli, Lemon Vin)

mixedGreens._note: How many portions of mixed greens per half pan

dicedTomatoes._note: Small portions use 16oz deli, medium use brown bowl, large use half pans

slicedRedOnion._note: Small portions use 16oz deli, medium use brown bowl, large use half pans

pepperoncini._note: Small: 16oz deli, Medium: 32oz deli, Large: half pan, XLarge: full pans

grilledPita._note: 1 pita per portion + 10% extra, 25 pitas per full pan

salads._note: Orders of 1-3 get 1 half pan each, 4+ get 2 half pans each

veggieSticks._note: Veggie sticks per dip order (when veggie modifier is present)

regularPita._note: Regular pita: 1 half pan per dip order, 6 pitas sliced into 8 pieces each

gfPita._note: GF pita is addon only - parse quantity from price ($2 per pita)

greekFries._note: 1 order gets 1 half pan, 2+ orders get 2 half pans each. Each order gets 3x 16oz toppings

dolmas._note: 1 order: brown bowl, 2-4 orders: round trays, 5+ orders: half pan

salads._note: 1 tong per salad type, 1 small spoon per type, 2 large spoons total for ALL salads

dips._note: 1 small spoon per dip type, 2 tongs for veggies (all dips), 1 tong for pita (all dips)

greekFries._note: 1 tong per Greek fries type, 3 small spoons total (aioli, tzatziki, feta)

byoGyros._note: 5 tongs (greens, tomatoes, onions, peppers, pita), 3 small (sauces), 1 large (tomatoes)
